casebody.data:
STATE
v.
NORFOLK JUNIOR BEST 300A93-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 27, 2019 Jonathan P. Babb, Special Counsel to Attorney General, Jon David, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Michael Unti, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Jay H. Ferguson, Attorney at Law, Durham, Erica W. Washington, Attorney at Law, for Best, Norfolk Junior.

*209Amended

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 26th of June 2019 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of June 2019."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 9th day of September, 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
